evidence.title: README (segment 1)
README (segment 4)
evidence.excerpt: A friendly Python wrapper around the [Deezer API](https://developers.deezer.com/api).

evidence.title: README (segment 5)
evidence.excerpt: The package is published on [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/deezer-python/) and can be installed by running:

evidence.title: README (segment 6)
evidence.excerpt: Easily query the Deezer API from you Python code. The data returned by the Deezer API is mapped to python resources:

evidence.title: README (segment 8)
evidence.excerpt: Ready for more? Look at our whole [documentation](http://deezer-python.readthedocs.io/) on Read The Docs or have a play in pre-populated Jupyter notebook [on Binder](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/browniebroke/deezer-python/main?filepath=demo.ipynb).

evidence.title: v7.2.0
evidence.excerpt: ## v7.2.0 (2025-09-18) _This release is published under the MIT License._ ### Features - Add support for Python 3.14 ([#1423](https://github.com/browniebroke/deezer-python/pull/1423), [`81adb2e`](https://github.com/browniebroke/deezer-python/commit/81adb2ebe81cbfe7344ebf415572e48f14b69ae0)) - Drop support for Python 3.9 ([#1422](https://github.com/browniebroke/deezer-python/pull/1422), [`cd837d2`](https://github.com/browniebroke/deezer-python/commit/cd837d2ce61a51d34c49b86db0dc84f205e742b2)) --- **Detailed Changes**: [v7.1.2...v7.2.0](https://github.com/browniebroke/deezer-python/compare/v7.1.2...v7.2.0)

evidence.title: v7.1.2
evidence.excerpt: ## v7.1.2 (2025-08-25) _This release is published under the MIT License._ ### Bug Fixes - Use SPDX expression for license ([#1405](https://github.com/browniebroke/deezer-python/pull/1405), [`858793a`](https://github.com/browniebroke/deezer-python/commit/858793add3fda6690c3be0e168204169e7916e95)) --- **Detailed Changes**: [v7.1.1...v7.1.2](https://github.com/browniebroke/deezer-python/compare/v7.1.1...v7.1.2)

evidence.title: v7.1.1
evidence.excerpt: ## v7.1.1 (2024-12-20) ### Bug Fixes - No forward parent when getting artist radio ([#1211](https://github.com/browniebroke/deezer-python/pull/1211), [`6807997`](https://github.com/browniebroke/deezer-python/commit/6807997aa8848a0aeffba23cdac70e11fcf0eef7)) ### Documentation - Add tdambrin as a contributor for bug ([#1232](https://github.com/browniebroke/deezer-python/pull/1232), [`125ff85`](https://github.com/browniebroke/deezer-python/commit/125ff859c649a89a96045a4bc0661afde89fd88f)) --- **Detailed Changes**: [v7.1.0...v7.1.1](https://github.com/browniebroke/deezer-python/compare/v7.1.0...v7.1.1)
